documentation.text:
@dev Transfer ownership of the contract
 @param newOwner The new owner address

devdoc.details: Role-based access control contract for managing permissions Supports multiple roles: ADMIN, AUDITOR, USER_REGISTRAR, DOCUMENT_MANAGER

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Get the admin for a specific role

params.role: The role to get admin for

grantRole(address,bytes32).details: Grant a role to an account (only owner or role admin)

params.account: The address to grant the role to

hasRole(address,bytes32).details: Check if an account has a specific role

returns._0: bool True if account has the role

revokeRole(address,bytes32).details: Revoke a role from an account (only owner or role admin)

params.account: The address to revoke the role from

params.admin: The address to set as admin
params.role: The role to set admin for

devdoc.title: AccessControl
